about_the_game:
Treasure of Creation

At the beginning of the universe's exploration, several supreme treasures of creation were born together, each possessing the function of defying the heavens. The ultimate treasure of creation is the creation of heaven and earth, the secret of invading the sun and moon, possessing one's own spiritual intelligence and immortality. As long as a cultivator with the treasure of creation can grow up, they will dominate a certain realm and become the supreme strength. When the owner of the treasure of creation falls, it will escape and cannot be captured, drifting in the vast universe, and then searching for someone who is destined.

Rich Stories

Lucky Hongmengzhu, Lucky Golden Axe, Lucky Lotus, Lucky Wood Leaf... Each Lucky Treasure corresponds to a character's story. They are either beggars from the slums or wealthy ladies living in luxury. In the dark, they were chosen as the treasure of creation and wandered through this treacherous world of cultivation. They either killed each other out of love, family, or friendship, opening a magnificent story of cultivation.

“Fate of Creation” is an open cultivation of immortal world fill with events and story, which allow you to explore freely and write their own legendary.

Game story will be changed by your decision, and each decision will lead player to a different destiny.

There are multiple endings in this game, so please twice think before you leap.

By beating powerful enemy or having extraordinary encouters are able to help you gain a variety of skills and spells. Use your powerful skills and ingenious strategy to frighten your enemies.

Get into the world of "Fate of Creation", explore the beautiful mountains and lakes, meet all kinds of cultivators, and build your own legandary in the "Fate of Creation".

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Destiny of Immortal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 SP1 or Windows8.1 or Windows10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 SP1 or Windows8.1 or Windows10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Inter Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: "Fate of Creation" is a roguelike game with rich story in a world of cultivation of immortals. You accidentally obtained one of the most precious treasures of creation and embarked on the path of cultivating immortals.
